thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Turtle Beach Sees Q4 2017 Earnings Per Share $0.29

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Turtle Beach Sees Q4 2017 Earnings Per Share $0.29
text:
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Turtle Beach Corp:
* TURTLE BEACH REPORTS SELECTED PRELIMINARY 2017 RESULTS * SEES FY 2017 LOSS PER SHARE ABOUT $0.07 * SEES Q4 2017 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.29 * SEES Q4 2017 SALES ABOUT $79.5 MILLION * SEES FY 2017 SALES ABOUT $149 MILLION * ‍BASED ON PRELIMINARY UNAUDITED INFORMATION, TURTLE BEACH EXPECTS TO REPORT Q4 2017 SALES OF APPROXIMATELY $79.5 MILLION​
* ‍NET LOSS IN 2017 EXPECTED TO BE $0.33 PER DILUTED SHARE EXCLUDING SOME ITEMS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
